text: Issi tarah hum ney unhen jaga ker utha diya kay aapas meinpooch gooch kerlen. Aik kehney walay ney kaha kay kiyon bhaee tum kitney dair thehray rahey? Unhon ney jawab diya kay aik din ya aik din say bhi kum. Kehney lagay kay tumharay thehray rehney ka ilm ba-khoobi Allah Taalaa hi ko hai. Abb to tum apney mein say kissi ko apni yeh chandi dey ker shehar bhejo woh khoob dekh bhaal ley kay shehar ka kaun say khana pakeeza tar hai phir ussi mein say tumharay liye khaney kay liye ley aaye aur boht ehtiyat aur narmi barttay aur kissi ko tumhari khabar na honey dey
